contains_no_content_of_requested_type.description: Set to true if the input text contains no pages to summarize. Otherwise, set to false.

entries.description: Array of page summaries from academic text. Each entry corresponds to one page.

page_number.description: Page number information, specifically, the page number (integer) and a boolean indicating whether the page contains no visible or assigned page number.

page_number_integer.description: Page number of the text being summarized. Page numbers normally appear in headers or footers and may be flanked by the article, chapter, or monograph title or author names.

contains_no_page_number.description: Set to true **if and only if** the page contains no page number; otherwise, false.

contains_no_semantic_content.description: Set to true **if and only if** the page contains no substantial semantic content, but only lists of references, sources, title or introductory pages, tables of contents, etc.

bullet_points.description: Concise bullet-point statements that capture the most essential ideas or findings on the page. Return an empty array if contains_no_semantic_content is true.

references.description: Full bibliographic citations appearing on the page, formatted in American Psychological Association (APA) style.

items.description: An individual literature reference in APA format.
